√grath 'tie'

present: [9.] grathnā́ti etc. B.+   -- [7.] gṛṇatti?   -- [1.] granthati  grathati  

[perfect: jagrantha  grathyāt  ajagranthat  agranthīt  ]

future: [1.] granthiṣyati   -- [2.] granthitā  

verbal: granthitá V.+  granthitvā  grathitvā  -grathya B.+  -grantham  

secondary: passive: grathyate   -- intensive: jāgranth-  jāgrathya-   -- desiderative: jigranthiṣa-   -- causative: granthayate  grathayati  

derivatives: grathín  grathya C.  grathana C.  grathanīya C.  grathitavya C.  grathna S.  grantha B.+  granthín RV.  granthana S.+  granthí V.+
